questionTitle: John decided <u><font color='red'>to buy</font></u> <u><font color='red'>in the morning a new car</font></u>, but <u><font color='red'>in the afternoon</font></u> <u><font color='red'>he changed his mind</font></u>.
anwers: in the morning a new car
